thread.title: Guggenheim Partners Spins Out $13 Billion Unit to Executive Following Lawsuit

author: Justin Baer
title: Guggenheim Partners Spins Out $13 Billion Unit to Executive Following Lawsuit

organizations.name: executive following lawsuit guggenheim partners llc

text:
Guggenheim Partners LLC said Tuesday it has spun out a $13 billion computer-driven investing business to a senior money manager who sued the financial firm last month.
Marcos Lopez de Prado, a senior managing director, filed his complaint against Guggenheim, several other entities and executives. The suit, filed under seal in federal court in downtown Manhattan in early January, was withdrawn later that month following a settlement.
